root.name: Outpost Kaloki X
root.description: GameplayThe game comes with several stand alone scenarios and two different story mode campaigns. The two campaigns are "Adventure" and "War", containing 14 and 10 scenarios respectively. Mission goals includes objectives like raising a specific amount of cash, reaching a certain space station star level, fending of attacking ships, and building a certain expansion.Almost all scenarios gives a limited amount of time to complete the goal, which put more pressure on the player to be as efficient as possible when spending money. Another limitation that is always present is the number of nodes, spaces where expansion bays can be built, is always small. Players are often forced to sell of an expansion to free up space for a better one. The game contains over 50 different expansions grouped into 8 different categories.
